      • shouldDisableDependents

        public boolean shouldDisableDependents()
        This determines whether the dependent preferences below this should be disabled. In this case, the dependent should be disabled if CUSTOM is not selected.
        Overrides:
        shouldDisableDependents in class android.preference.Preference
